name: prayers_times
desc:
The prayers_times library provides a collection of utilities and calculations
related to prayer times, celestial calculations, and other Islamic insights.

name: CelestialMap
desc:
The CelestialMap class provides calculations related to the solar coordinates,
including declination, right ascension, and apparent sidereal time.

name: CelestialMap
desc: Constructs a CelestialMap object and calculates solar coordinates for a given Julian Day.

name: apparentSiderealTime
desc: The apparent sidereal time, which represents the hour angle of the vernal equinox.

name: declination
desc: The declination of the sun, which is the angle between the rays of the Sun and the plane of the Earth's equator.

name: degreesToRadians
desc: Converts degrees to radians.

name: radiansToDegrees
desc: Converts radians to degrees.

name: rightAscension
desc: The right ascension of the Sun, which is the angular distance on the celestial equator from the vernal equinox to the hour circle.

name: sereneFlex
desc: Adjusts an angle to be within the range of 0 to 360 degrees.

name: altitudeOfCelestialBody
desc: Calculate the altitude of a celestial body above the horizon for a given observer.

name: apparentObliquityOfTheEcliptic
desc: Calculate the apparent obliquity of the ecliptic, corrected for calculating the apparent position of the sun.

name: apparentSolarLongitude
desc: Calculate the apparent longitude of the Sun, referred to the true equinox of the date.

name: approximateTransit
desc: Calculate the approximate time of the celestial body's transit.

name: ascendingLunarNodeLongitude
desc: Calculate the longitude of the ascending lunar node in degrees.

name: correctedHourAngle
desc: Calculate the corrected hour angle for a celestial body.

name: correctedTransit
desc: Calculate the corrected time of the celestial body's transit.

name: daysSinceSolstice
desc: Calculate the number of days since the solstice for a given day of the year and latitude.

name: interpolate
desc: Interpolate a value given equidistant previous and next values and a factor.

name: interpolateAngles
desc: Interpolate three angles, accounting for angle unwinding.

name: isLeapYear
desc: Determine whether a given year is a leap year (has 366 days).

name: julianCentury
desc: Calculate the Julian Century from the given Julian Day.

name: julianDay
desc: Calculate the Julian Day for the given Gregorian date components.

name: meanLunarLongitude
desc: Calculate the geometric mean longitude of the moon in degrees.

name: meanObliquityOfTheEcliptic
desc: Calculate the mean obliquity of the ecliptic, formula adopted by the International CelestialMath Union.

name: meanSiderealTime
desc: Calculate the mean sidereal time, which represents the hour angle of the vernal equinox, in degrees.

name: meanSolarAnomaly
desc: Calculate the mean anomaly of the sun in degrees.

name: meanSolarLongitude
desc: Calculate the geometric mean longitude of the sun in degrees.

name: nutationInLongitude
desc: Calculate the nutation in longitude, which represents the variation in the apparent position of a celestial body due to the gravitational influences of the sun and moon.

name: nutationInObliquity
desc: Calculate the nutation in obliquity, which represents the variation in the tilt of the Earth's axis due to the gravitational influences of the sun and moon.

name: seasonAdjustedEveningTwilight
desc: Calculate the time of season-adjusted evening twilight.

name: seasonAdjustedMorningTwilight
desc: Calculate the time of season-adjusted morning twilight.

name: solarEquationOfTheCenter
desc: Calculate the Sun's equation of the center in degrees.

name: CelestialTimeUtils
desc: The CelestialTimeUtils class provides various date and time calculations related to celestial phenomena.

name: dateByAddingDays
desc: Adds a specified number of days to the given date and returns the resulting date.

name: dateByAddingMinutes
desc: Adds a specified number of minutes to the given date and returns the resulting date.

name: dateByAddingSeconds
desc: Adds a specified number of seconds to the given date and returns the resulting date.

name: dayOfYear
desc: Calculates the day of the year for the given date.

name: roundedMinute
desc: Rounds the given date to the nearest minute and returns the resulting date.

name: CelestialUtils
desc: The CelestialUtils class provides utility functions for celestial calculations and angle manipulation.

name: degreesToRadians
desc: Convert degrees to radians.

name: normalizeToScale
desc: Normalize a number to a given scale.

name: quadrantShiftAngle
desc: Shift an angle to the nearest equivalent within [-180, 180) degrees.

name: radiansToDegrees
desc: Convert radians to degrees.

name: sereneFlex
desc: Unwind an angle to the range [0, 360) degrees.

name: Coordinates
desc: The Coordinates class represents geographical coordinates on the Earth's surface.

name: Coordinates
desc: Creates a new Coordinates object with the specified latitude and longitude.

name: latitude
desc: The latitude value in degrees.

name: longitude
desc: The longitude value in degrees.

name: HighLatitudeRule
desc:
The HighLatitudeRule class provides predefined rules for handling high latitudes
when calculating Islamic prayer times.

name: middleOfTheNight
desc: Middle of the night rule, where Fajr and Isha are set to half the duration of the night.

name: seventhOfTheNight
desc: Seventh of the night rule, where Fajr and Isha are set to one-seventh of the duration of the night.

name: twilightAngle
desc: Twilight angle rule, where Fajr and Isha are determined based on specified twilight angles.

name: PrayerCalculationMethod
desc: The PrayerCalculationMethod class provides predefined calculation methods for determining Islamic prayer times.

name: dubai
desc: Dubai calculation method.

name: egyptian
desc: Egyptian General Authority of Survey calculation method.

name: karachi
desc: University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi calculation method.

name: kuwait
desc: Kuwait calculation method.

name: moonsightingCommittee
desc: Moonsighting Committee calculation method.

name: morocco
desc: Moroccan Ministry of Habous and Islamic Affairs calculation method.

name: muslimWorldLeague
desc: Muslim World League calculation method.

name: northAmerica
desc: ISNA (Islamic Society of North America) calculation method.

name: other
desc: Custom or unspecified calculation method.

name: qatar
desc: Qatar calculation method.

name: singapore
desc: Singapore calculation method.

name: tehran
desc: Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran calculation method.

name: turkey
desc: Dianet (Turkey) calculation method.

name: ummAlQura
desc: Umm al-Qura University, Makkah calculation method.

name: PrayerCalculationParameters
desc: The PrayerCalculationParameters class represents parameters used for calculating Islamic prayer times.

name: PrayerCalculationParameters
desc: Creates a new PrayerCalculationParameters object with the specified parameters.

name: adjustments
desc: Adjustments for various prayer times.

name: fajrAngle
desc: The angle for Fajr (pre-dawn) prayer in degrees.

name: highLatitudeRule
desc: The rule for calculating high latitude prayer times.

name: ishaAngle
desc: The angle for Isha (nightfall) prayer in degrees.

name: ishaInterval
desc: The interval between sunset and Isha prayer in minutes.

name: madhab
desc: The chosen madhab (school of thought) for the prayer time calculation.

name: maghribAngle
desc: The angle for Maghrib (sunset) prayer in degrees.

name: method
desc: The calculation method name.

name: methodAdjustments
desc: Method-specific adjustments for various prayer times.

name: nightPortions
desc: Determines the portions of the night for Fajr and Isha prayers based on the chosen high latitude rule.

name: PrayerMadhab
desc: The PrayerMadhab class provides predefined madhabs (schools of thought) for Islamic prayer time calculations.

name: hanafi
desc: The Hanafi madhab for Islamic prayer time calculations.

name: shafi
desc: The Shafi madhab for Islamic prayer time calculations.

name: PrayerTimeCalculator
desc: The PrayerTimeCalculator class provides utilities for calculating shadow length based on a specified madhab.

name: shadowLength
desc: Calculates the shadow length for Asr prayer time based on the specified madhab.

name: PrayerTimeConverter
desc: A utility class for converting decimal time values into UTC date and time for prayer times.

name: PrayerTimeConverter
desc: Creates a PrayerTimeConverter instance from a decimal number representing time.

name: utcDate
desc: Constructs a DateTime object in UTC using the stored time components and provided date information.

name: PrayerTimes
desc: The PrayerTimes class calculates prayer times based on provided coordinates, date, and calculation parameters.

name: PrayerTimes
desc: Constructs a PrayerTimes object and calculates Islamic prayer times based on the provided parameters.

name: asrStartTime
desc: The time for the Asr (afternoon) prayer's start and end.

name: calculationParameters
desc: The calculation parameters used to determine the prayer times.

name: coordinates
desc: The geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the location for which prayer times are calculated.

name: currentPrayer
desc: Returns the current prayer based on the provided date.

name: date
desc: The date for which the prayer times are being calculated.

name: dhuhrStartTime
desc: The time for the Dhuhr (noon) prayer's start and end.

name: fajrStartTime
desc: The time for the Fajr (pre-dawn) prayer's start and end.

name: ishaStartTime
desc: The time for the Isha (night) prayer's start and end.

name: locationName
desc: The name of the location for which the prayer times are being calculated.

name: maghribStartTime
desc: The time for the Maghrib (evening) prayer's start and end.

name: nextPrayer
desc: Returns the next prayer based on the provided date.

name: sehri
desc: The time for the Sehri (pre-dawn meal) corresponding to Fajr.

name: sunrise
desc: The time for the Sunrise prayer.

name: timeForPrayer
desc: Returns the calculated time for the specified prayer.

name: PrayerType
desc: The PrayerType class provides constants representing different types of Islamic prayers.

name: asr
desc: Asr (afternoon) prayer.

name: dhuhr
desc: Dhuhr (noon) prayer.

name: fajr
desc: Fajr prayer.

name: fajrAfter
desc: Fajr prayer performed after midnight.

name: isha
desc: Isha (night) prayer.

name: ishaBefore
desc: Isha prayer performed before midnight.

name: maghrib
desc: Maghrib (evening) prayer.

name: none
desc: No specific prayer type.

name: sehri
desc: Sehri type.

name: sunrise
desc: Sunrise prayer.

name: Qibla
desc: The Qibla class provides a method to calculate the Qibla direction (direction of the Kaaba in Makkah) from a given location.

name: degreesToRadians
desc: Converts degrees to radians.

name: madina
desc: Calculates the madina direction (direction of the Al-Masjid an-Nabawi) from a given location.

name: qibla
desc: Calculates the Qibla direction (direction of the Kaaba) from a given location.

name: radiansToDegrees
desc: Converts radians to degrees.

name: sereneFlex
desc: Adjusts an angle to be within the range of 0 to 360 degrees.

name: StellarMoment
desc:
The StellarMoment class provides calculations related to solar time,
including sunrise, sunset, and solar transit times.

name: StellarMoment
desc: Constructs a StellarMoment object and calculates solar times for the given date and observer coordinates.

name: afternoon
desc: Calculate the afternoon time based on the provided shadow length.

name: approxTransit
desc: The approximate transit time of the sun (in universal time).

name: hourAngle
desc: Calculate the hour angle based on the provided angle and whether it's after transit.

name: nextSolar
desc: Solar coordinates for the next day.

name: observer
desc: The geographical coordinates of the observer.

name: prevSolar
desc: Solar coordinates for the previous day.

name: solar
desc: Solar coordinates for the current date.

name: sunrise
desc: The sunrise time (in universal time).

name: sunset
desc: The sunset time (in universal time).

name: transit
desc: The solar transit time (in universal time).

name: SunnahInsights
desc: The SunnahInsights class provides calculations for middle of the night and last third of the night times.

name: SunnahInsights
desc: Constructs a SunnahInsights object and calculates middle of the night and last third of the night times.

name: lastThirdOfTheNight
desc: The time representing the last third of the night.

name: middleOfTheNight
desc: The time representing the middle of the night.
